title: sadha namOsthuthE
sahitya:
sadA namOstutE mahA gaNapatE sadAshivAtmaja prabhO shubhAkrtE

anupallavi

 gadAdihara hEramba lambOdara gajAnana bhagnaradana vighnEshvara

caraNam

 ananta nagara pUrvApaNEshvara abhangragurAnanda vara dAna tatpara 
ananta guNa mandira manOhara amanda karuNa vana tulasIdhara
